remarks: A variable not free remains so after substitution with a distinct variable (closed form of ~ hbsb4 ).  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)
statement: hbsb4t $p |- ( A. x A. z ( ph -> A. z ph ) -> ( -. A. z z = y -> ( [ y / x ] ph -> A. z [ y / x ] ph ) ) ) $.
